func sink(nums []int, n int, i int) {
	//nä¸ºæ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œiä¸ºå½“å‰çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç´¢å¼•
    max := i
    l, r := 2*i+1, 2*i+2
    //å¦‚æœç¢°åˆ°å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼å¤§äºçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç”¨å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨ä¸­æœ€å¤§çš„å€¼æ¥æ›¿æ¢
    if l < n && nums[l] > nums[max] {
        max = l
    }
    if r < n && nums[r] > nums[max] {
        max = r
    }
    //æŠŠçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹æ¢ä¸‹å»å¹¶å‘ä¸‹è°ƒæ•´
    if max != i {
        nums[max], nums[i] = nums[i], nums[max]
        sink(nums, n, max)
    }
}

	}
	//å¯¹å †è¿›è¡Œæ’åºï¼Œå°†ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå€¼äº’æ¢ï¼Œçœç•¥å¯¹æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå€¼çš„æ’åº
	for i := n - 1; i > 0; i-- {
		nums[0], nums[i] = nums[i], nums[0]
		//æ’åºè¿‡ç¨‹ä»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€å§‹ï¼Œå‘ä¸‹æ²‰
		sink(nums, i, 0)
	}
}

func sink(nums []int, n int, i int) {
	max := i
	l, r := 2*i+1, 2*i+2
	//å¦‚æœç¢°åˆ°å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼å¤§äºçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç”¨å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åœ¨ä¸­æœ€å¤§çš„å€¼æ¥æ›¿æ¢
	if l < n && nums[l] > nums[max] {
		max = l
	}
	if r < n && nums[r] > nums[max] {
		max = r
	}
	//æŠŠçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹æ¢ä¸‹å»å¹¶å‘ä¸‹è°ƒæ•´
	if max != i {
		nums[max], nums[i] = nums[i], nums[max]
		sink(nums, n, max)
	}
}

type h []int

func (h *h) Len() int           { return len(*h) }
func (h *h) Less(i, j int) bool { return (*h)[i] < (*h)[j] }
func (h *h) Swap(i, j int)      { (*h)[i], (*h)[j] = (*h)[j], (*h)[i] }

	return v
}

func topKFrequent(nums []int, k int) []int {
	maps := make(map[int]int)
	for i := 0; i < len(nums); i++ {
		if _, ok := maps[nums[i]]; ok {
			maps[nums[i]]++
		} else {
			maps[nums[i]] = 1
		}
	}

	iheap := &Iheap{}
	heap.Init(iheap)

	for key, value := range maps {
		if iheap.Len() < k {
			heap.Push(iheap, [2]int{key, value})
		} else {
			if (*iheap)[0][1] < value {
				heap.Pop(iheap)
				heap.Push(iheap, [2]int{key, value})
			}
		}
	}

	res := make([]int, k)
	for i := 0; i < k; i++ {
		res[k-i-1] = heap.Pop(iheap).([2]int)[0]
	}

	return res
}

type Iheap [][2]int

func (h Iheap) Len() int           { return len(h) }
func (h Iheap) Less(i, j int) bool { return h[i][1] < h[j][1] }
func (h Iheap) Swap(i, j int)      { h[i], h[j] = h[j], h[i] }

func (h *Iheap) Push(x interface{}) {
	*h = append(*h, x.([2]int))
}

func (h *Iheap) Pop() interface{} {
	old := *h
	n := len(old)
	x := old[n-1]
	*h = old[0 : n-1]
	return x
}

type Heap []int

func (h *Heap) Len() int {
    return len(*h)
}

func (h *Heap) Less(i, j int) bool {
    return (*h)[i] < (*h)[j]
}

func (h *Heap) Swap(i, j int) {
    (*h)[i], (*h)[j] = (*h)[j], (*h)[i]
}

func (h *Heap) Push(v interface{}) {
    *h = append(*h, v.(int))
}

func (h *Heap) Pop() interface{} {
    v := (*h)[len(*h)-1]
    *h = (*h)[:len(*h)-1]
    return v
}

func nthUglyNumber(n int) int {
    var res int
    box := make(map[int]bool)
    var h Heap
    heap.Init(&h)

    
    heap.Push(&h, 1)
    for n > 0 {
        res = heap.Pop(&h).(int)
        fmt.Println(res)
        if !box[res*2] {
            box[res*2] = true
            heap.Push(&h, res*2)
        }
        if !box[res*3] {
            box[res*3] = true
            heap.Push(&h, res*3)
        }
        if !box[res*5] {
            box[res*5] = true
            heap.Push(&h, res*5)
        }
        n--
    }
    return res
}

nums := []int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}
target := 5
left, right := 0, len(nums)-1
var output int
for left <= right {
	mid := (left + right) >> 1
	if nums[mid] == target {
		output = mid
		break
	} else if nums[mid] > target {
		right = mid - 1
	} else if nums[mid] < target {
		left = mid + 1
	}
}

func searchInsert(nums []int, target int) int {

    left, right := 0, len(nums)-1

}

func searchInsert(nums []int, target int) int {
    if target > nums[len(nums)-1] {
        return len(nums)
    }

    left, right := 0, len(nums)-1
    for left <= right {
        mid := (left + right)/2
        if nums[mid] < target {
            left = mid + 1
        }else {
            right = mid - 1
        }
    }
    return left 
}

func searchRange(nums []int, target int) []int {
    if len(nums) == 0 || target > nums[len(nums)-1] || target < nums[0] {
        return []int{-1,-1}
    }
    start, end := 0, 0
    left, right := 0, len(nums)-1
    for left < right {
        mid := (left+right) >> 1
        if nums[mid] < target {
            left = mid + 1
        }else {
            right = mid
        }
    }
    start = left

    left, right = 0, len(nums)-1
    for left < right {
        mid := (left+right+1) >> 1
        if nums[mid] > target {
            right = mid - 1
        }else {
            left = mid
        }
    }
    end = left
    if start > end {
        return []int{-1, -1}
    }
    return []int{start, end}
}

func findMin(nums []int) int {
    left, right, mid := 0, len(nums)-1, 0
    for left < right {
        mid = (left + right) >> 1
        if nums[mid] > nums[right] {
            left = mid + 1
        }else {
            right = mid
        }
    }
    return nums[left]
}

    left, mid, right := 0, 0, len(nums)-1
    for left < right {
        mid = (left + right) >> 1
        if nums[mid] > nums[right] {
            left = mid + 1
        }else if nums[mid] < nums[right] {
            right = mid
        }else if nums[mid] == nums[right] {

        }
    }
    return nums[left]
}
